}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "48DHXA09.0GA" and "2013/03/15" is silkscreened on the board. {{See also|Wistron NeWeb|Unex}} *802.11b/g/n 1x1 Mini PCIe (half-size) :Bluetooth 4.0 Combo (WB335/QCA9565)
===Unex's marketing text=== DHXA-335D is an 802.11n and Bluetooth 4.0 combo mPCIe which delivers up to 150Mbps Wi-Fi data rate and supports Bluetooth high speed and low energy. Advanced integration delivers superior Wi-Fi and Bluetooth coexistence to ensure the best possible wireless experience at lowest power consumption.
==Links of Interest== [https://www.unex.com.tw/products/wi-fi/interfaces/pcie-wifi/80211n-bluetooth/detail/dhxa-335d Specifications]
